# HELP fluentbit_uptime Number of seconds that Fluent Bit has been running.
# TYPE fluentbit_uptime counter
fluentbit_uptime{hostname="telemetry-fluent-bit-dglkf"} 5489
# HELP fluentbit_input_bytes_total Number of input bytes.
# TYPE fluentbit_input_bytes_total counter
fluentbit_input_bytes_total{name="tele-tail"} 5217998
# HELP fluentbit_input_records_total Number of input records.
# TYPE fluentbit_input_records_total counter
fluentbit_input_records_total{name="tele-tail"} 24227
# HELP fluentbit_input_files_opened_total Total number of opened files
# TYPE fluentbit_input_files_opened_total counter
fluentbit_input_files_opened_total{name="tele-tail"} 41
# HELP fluentbit_input_bytes_total Number of input bytes.
# TYPE fluentbit_input_bytes_total counter
fluentbit_input_bytes_total{name="fluentbit_metrics.1"} 0
# HELP fluentbit_input_records_total Number of input records.
# TYPE fluentbit_input_records_total counter
fluentbit_input_records_total{name="fluentbit_metrics.1"} 0
# HELP fluentbit_input_metrics_scrapes_total Number of total metrics scrapes
# TYPE fluentbit_input_metrics_scrapes_total counter
fluentbit_input_metrics_scrapes_total{name="fluentbit_metrics.1"} 183
# HELP fluentbit_input_bytes_total Number of input bytes.
# TYPE fluentbit_input_bytes_total counter
